actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 834 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 198.

Amendment SA 834 proposed by Senator Daschle. (consideration:  CR S7095-7097; text:  CR S7096) To express the sense of the Senate that Social Security cost-of-living adjustments should not be reduced.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 834 proposed by Senator Daschle.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 834 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 198.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate that Social Security cost-of-living adjustments should not be reduced.
